text: Daniel Jorge Castellani (born 21 March 1961) is a former Argentine volleyball player and coach, a member of Argentina men's national volleyball team in 1976-1988, bronze medalist of the Olympic Games Seoul 1988, a participant of the Olympic Games Los Angeles 1984, head coach of Sir Safety Perugia. Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine volleyball players Category:Volleyball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Argentina
title: Daniel Castellani
